meta.title: ATS Scanner
meta.description: AI-powered ATS scanner that helps you to scan and improve your resume to maximize your chances of getting hired.

hero.title: Scan your resume
hero.description: Upload your resume in PDF format to get an AI-powered analysis of its ATS compatibility and overall quality.

features.sectionDescription: Get AI-powered feedback to make your resume pass ATS filters and impress recruiters.

ai.title: AI-Powered Analysis
ai.description: Our AI evaluates your resume like a recruiter and an ATS. Get pros, cons, and a 0–100 score to see where you stand.

score.title: ATS Compatibility Score
score.description: See how well your resume will pass ATS filters. Fix issues before you apply and increase your chances of landing interviews.

structured.title: Structured Feedback
structured.description: Get both quick pros and cons and a detailed breakdown by category—formatting, content, impact—so you know exactly what to improve.

privacy.title: Privacy-Focused
privacy.description: Your PDF is converted to text in your browser. Only that text is sent for analysis, so your full resume never travels as a file.

instant.title: Instant, Actionable Results
instant.description: Get your analysis in seconds with clear, specific suggestions you can act on right away—no waiting, no guesswork.

multilang.title: Multi-Language Support
multilang.description: Use the app and read your feedback in your language. We support English and Spanish so you can focus on improving, not translating.

cta.description: Scan your resume and improve your chances of getting hired.
